cbwc.title: You need to come back with a computer to sign up.
cbwc.body:
Draft relies on its performance and powerful features to help you work and collaborate efficiently.

Unfortunately, using Draft on a mobile device can't provide you with a satisfying experience.

As we seek to give you the best experience possible, we would be grateful if you could come back with a computer to sign up for Draft.

In the meantime, you can keep browsing the website with your current device.
